Nord Stream sues insurers in London over 2022 pipeline blastsNord Stream is seeking more than 400 million euros ($436 million) from its insurers over explosions in 2022 which ruptured pipelines designed to transport Russian gas to Germany, court filings show. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 15:08:14 GMT Q4AQBGG7F5L5XHE4IVYXZZTPJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/nord-stream-sues-insurers-london-over-2022-pipeline-blasts-2024-03-12/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Exclusive: U.S. preparing new weapons package for Ukraine-officialsThe United States is preparing a new military aid package for Ukraine that could be worth as much as $400 million, two U.S. officials told Reuters on Tuesday, the first such move in months as additional funds for Kyiv remain blocked by Republican leaders in Congress. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:50:30 GMT MXDRBZ5D3FLUHKM5HBDRVUYWGM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/us-preparing-new-weapons-package-ukraine-officials-2024-03-12/Mike Stone, Idrees Ali商业航空航天与国防
Hungary protests Biden's 'dictatorship' comments about OrbanHungary summoned the U.S. ambassador to protest over remarks by President Joe Biden at a campaign stop saying Prime Minister Viktor Orban was seeking dictatorship, Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto told a news briefing on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:49:33 GMT XMT44LDKPBO6TLE34YKC5HQBVI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-protests-bidens-dictatorship-comments-about-orban-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Boeing whistleblower found dead of apparent suicideJohn Barnett, a former Boeing employee who had reportedly raised concerns about the company's production issues, was found dead of an apparent suicide, according to authorities in South Carolina. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:47:32 GMT GY7NFXLYOZIAPKMQGI3CUYAJYE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/boeing-whistleblower-found-dead-apparent-suicide-2024-03-12/Reuters世界美国
Brazil's inflation tops estimates in February to highest monthly figure in a yearBrazil's consumer prices rose slightly more than expected in February, reaching the highest monthly figure in one year driven by increased education prices, government statistics agency IBGE said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:42:19 GMT BCYMKX5NLBKYHMBGXL3DZMNQMU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-inflation-tops-estimates-february-highest-monthly-figure-year-2024-03-12/Reuters世界美洲
White House denies Russian allegations of attempted election meddlingRussian allegations that the United States is trying to meddle in its presidential election are "categorically false," the White House said on Tuesday, renewing its accusations of Moscow election interference in the U.S. and elsewhere. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:35:41 GMT VW5EEALB3BJ7TICO6JL74NLOOY https://www.reuters.com/world/white-house-denies- Russian-allegations-attempted-election-meddling-2024-03-12/Jeff Mason技术网络安全
Turkey seeks extradition of teen, mother who fled to U.S. after deadly car crashTurkey requested extradition of a teenager and his mother who fled to the United States after a fatal road accident in Istanbul, Justice Minister Yilmaz Tunc said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:31:02 GMT 3QPM5ZFWJ5I5HBKYJATPXSGXIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-seeks-extradition-teen-mother-who-fled-us-after-deadly-car-crash-2024-03-12/Reuters世界中东
Russian elite expects Putin to reshuffle some positions after election winRussia's elite is expecting President Vladimir Putin to reshuffle government positions to bring in younger people after what it sees as the formality of his resounding election victory this weekend, four sources close to the authorities said. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:05:12 GMT JBADORZETZIUVFAOQ7HQPRJTAU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-elite-expects-putin-reshuffle-some-positions-after-election-win-2024-03-12/Guy Faulconbridge, Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
Philippine seafarers who survived Houthi Red Sea attack arrive homeEleven Filipino seafarers arrived in the Philippines on Tuesday nearly a week after they survived a Houthi missile attack off Yemen. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 14:03:10 GMT DMCBVM7X2RLHTHY3I4OM4J2B64 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-seafarers-who-survived-houthi-red-sea-attack-arrive-home-2024-03-12/Jay Ereno, Eloisa Lopez世界亚太地区
A mother's voicemail at her graveside marks painful Ramadan for Gaza sonMarking the first day of Ramadan alone among the graves of his loved ones at a cemetery in Gaza, Ibrahim Hassouna listened to a voicemail message his mother left him before she was killed in Israel's military offensive on the Palestinian territory. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 13:32:10 GMT AX4BQJ2HMVPQ5FJP2ZPT2HGRYU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mothers-voicemail-her-graveside-marks-painful-ramadan-gaza-son-2024-03-12/Mohammed Salem世界中东
Haitian leader says he will quit after transitional council formed as gang violence increasesHaiti's Prime Minister Ariel Henry, stranded in Puerto Rico as gang violence sweeps across his country, said on Monday night he will resign as soon as a transition council and a temporary leader are chosen. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 13:29:41 GMT 2QWHDRKHUNJFRCWUWNTUFFT2MI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haitian-leader-says-he-will-quit-after-transitional-council-formed-gang-violence-2024-03-12/Reuters世界美洲
